variable.name: Specimen
variable.description: These numbers are the sample/subject numbers assigned by the collecting brain banks.
variable.comment: Colorado-A and B specimens were identified and provided by Greg Owens, University of Colorado.

variable.name: Phenotype
variable.description: The assigned group: primary progressive MS (as identified by the brain bank source), NMO, normal control, or encephalitis. All group designations were assigned by the brain banks.

variable.name: Source
variable.description: UCLA: Human Brain and Spinal Fluid Resource Center, VA Los Angeles, 11301 Wilshire Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 90073; Rocky Mountain MS Center, 701 E. Hampden Ave. Suite 420, Englewood, CO 80113; Greg Owens, University of Colorado.

variable.name: Year of Collection
variable.description: Year the specimen was collected by the brain bank.

variable.name: Post Mortem Interval
variable.description: The time between death of the patient and collection with freezing of the brain specimen.

variable.name: Age
variable.description: Age of the donor at the time of death.

variable.name: Specimen Site
variable.description: Anatomic site of the specimen used in the sequencing runs.
variable.comment: Not available for all specimens and impossible to determine based on the appearance of the specimens.

variable.name: NeuroPathology
variable.description: This is a summary of the relevant neuropathology readings as provided by the collecting brain banks.

variable.name: Additional Data
variable.description: Includes information about concomitant illnesses and results from submitting lab studies.
